Saw_Noise_Indicator_main_menu_desc: A mod that helps you to saw silently using mechanic of game
Saw_Noise_Indicator_prediction_value_des: Value of time before saw silence will end
Saw_Noise_Indicator_loud_saw_effect_desc: If off, will be no effect when saw is loud
Saw_Noise_Indicator_silent_saw_color_tit: 小olor effect of the silent saw
Saw_Noise_Indicator_silent_saw_color_des: Effect with this color will appear when saw is silent
Saw_Noise_Indicator_loud_saw_color_title: 小olor effect of the loud saw
Saw_Noise_Indicator_loud_saw_color_desc: Effect with this color will appear when saw is loud
Saw_Noise_Indicator_silent_saw_color_inp: 小olor effect of the silent saw
Write hex color. Effect with this color will appear when saw is silent
Saw_Noise_Indicator_loud_saw_color_input: 小olor effect of the loud saw
Write hex color. Effect with this color will appear when saw is loud
